title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.4 - Title and duties of temporary reappointed members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.4 - Title and duties of temporary reappointed members

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the rank held by the member at retirement, temporarily reappointed members shall be appointed either to the title of
special trooper, and hold a rank equivalent to the rank of trooper in the
uniform force, or to the title of special investigator, and hold a rank
equivalent to the rank of investigator in the BCI. Such appointments and
assignments shall be dependent upon the division's needs and the member's
qualifications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
469.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
